title: Behind The Idea #3: Teva's Tribulations
description: Teva Pharmaceuticals, the Israeli generic pharmaceutical giant, has fallen on hard times recently. But does that mean they actually have the government over a barrel? Seeking Alpha's Behind The Idea looks at Christiana Friedman's case for why Teva is a heads you win tails you don't win investment. https://seekingalpha.com/article/4134268-whether-restructures-gets-acquired-teva-buy
